reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, soft, and well-made, appreciating its perfect weight for fall.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars XS fits my 95lb frame perfectly
items.body: I not really good at writing reviews on everything I buy but I had to write this one. I'm 5'2", weigh 95 lbs. I love, love, love this sweater. It could be a bit heavier but it's ok that it's not. It's soft and stretchy and best of all, the XS fits perfectly. Regardless of your size, it's just a super nice sweater. I got mine in gray and also love the color. Read more
items.author: Jackie Villers

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Embracing Fall Fashion with Style
items.body: The Arach&Cloz Women's Fall Fashion 2023 V Neck Long Sleeve Pullover Knitted Casual Sweater Tops have become an instant favorite in my fall wardrobe. The Cozy Clouds design not only lives up to its name but also encapsulates the essence of comfortable and chic fall fashion. The V-neck silhouette adds a touch of femininity, creating a flattering neckline that's perfect for showcasing accessories or layering with scarves. The long sleeves provide warmth without sacrificing style, making this sweater an ideal choice for transitioning into the cooler months. The knitted fabric is soft and inviting, offering a cozy embrace that feels delightful against the skin. The attention to detail in the knit pattern adds texture and depth, elevating the overall aesthetic of the sweater. The Cozy Clouds design is a charming touch, infusing a playful and whimsical element into the fall wardrobe. It's a subtle yet eye-catching feature that sets this sweater apart from more traditional designs. Versatility is a key highlight of this sweater. It pairs effortlessly with jeans, leggings, or skirts, making it a versatile piece for various occasions. Whether for a casual weekend outing or a relaxed workday, the Arach&Cloz sweater effortlessly combines comfort and style. In conclusion, the Arach&Cloz Women's Fall Fashion 2023 V Neck Long Sleeve Pullover Knitted Casual Sweater Tops are a must-have for those looking to embrace fall fashion with both warmth and style. The Cozy Clouds design adds a touch of whimsy, making this sweater a delightful choice for the season. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a cozy yet fashionable addition to their fall wardrobe. Read more
items.author: LadyRN

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality!
items.body: This sweater is light enough to layer in the cooler months. Fits great. What I really love is the softness! Very comfortable and breathes well so I dont feel like I am getting over heated (easy to do after 50 yrs old ladies). The neckline is positioned nicely. Deep enough to be a little sexy but not overly reavealing. The color matches the picture. Constuction is sturdy, no random thread ends that are loose an.d hanging out. Dress it up for business, or pair it with your favorite jeans or capris. I think you will really like it, I do! Read more
items.author: senta warren

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for 5'3" people! :D
items.body: Great fit and fabric. I'm 5 ft. 3.5 in. tall and 137 lbs. I purchased a small and I love how it fits. I'm also pretty small busted. I saw a review about the neckline poking up a bit but mine isn't bad at all. I purchased this sweater for work to go under blazers and be nice enough for when I'm too warm for the blazer. I love that it has some texture and since it's a solid color it will go with MANY things. I'm definitely going to be getting more! Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are really beautiful sweaters and so soft.
items.body: I love these sweaters! They are so cute, so soft, and so beautiful. I have 4 others but in different colors and not all are v neck. Great sweaters for the price. I will definitely order more. Spring time, will order the short sleeve sweaters and sleeveless sweaters. I love all the different colors. Quality is fantastic too. I highly recommend this vendor. Read more
items.author: Amethyst Rose

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Inconsistent Sizing
items.body: I wasn't sure how to review this top. So here I go. For reference. I'm a size M/L depending on style/cut. 165 and a 38D. I purchased two of these sweaters, one in a caramel color and the other one in burnt orange and both in size large. I received the burnt orange first. I loved the look and the fit and the color was as listed. Strangely, for the caramel colored shirt, I had to pick it up at an Amazon location farther away from me, because the location where I received the other sweater was full. When I received notification that the caramel color one was in, I got excited because I wanted to wear it with my new Spanx pants in tweed that had the same caramel color in it. So I went out of my way this evening to go pick up the top so that I could wash it and wear it tomorrow to work. I was surprised and annoyed when I tried it on as it was very loose. Too loose and too long for me. It felt frumpy. If you look at the pictures, you will see the difference between the burnt orange and caramel. I show pictures of the sizes, as they are both large, but one is larger than the other. It is going back and I won't be purchasing another in this brand. As far as the sweater, it is nice but I don't know how it holds up to washing. I'm keeping the burnt orange and when I do end up washing it, I will update this review if it doesn't hold well or if it stretches out. Read more
items.author: PRS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome buy!!!
items.body: Love this sweater!! It’s very comfy and true to size. I’m 5’10” 137 pounds with a long torso. It fits perfectly. Read more
items.author: Dee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft sweater sweater
items.body: I have purchased a sweater in the golden yellow and warm, orange in small. I love these sweaters. They are very warm and soft. I highly recommend them.! I wash them on light warm toss them lightly in the dryer and lay them on a towel to finish drying then I hang them on a wide hanger in the closet. They look beautiful and wear well. I also complement them with a jacket on cooler days.. Read more
items.author: Teacher working hard

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Nutmeg, Striped Apricot Black, Striped Navy White, Striped Black White, Heather Green, Black, Dusty Blue, Red Caramel, Striped Brown White, Striped Grey White, White Apricot 02, Peacock Green 02, Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
